### Load Libraries

```{r_load_libraries}
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(stringr)
library(forcats)
library(viridis)
library(plotly)
```

## Dataset

```{r}
airbnb = read_csv("./data/nyc_airbnb.zip") %>% 
  clean_names() %>% 
  rename(boro = neighbourhood_group) %>% 
  filter(boro == "Manhattan",
         room_type == "Entire home/apt",
         price > 100 & price < 400)

```
